alert.note: Alert for Churchill; Pershing (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 08 at 5:01PM PDT until August 08 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northwestern Churchill County in west central Nevada... Pershing County in west central Nevada... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 458 PM PDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 34 miles northwest of New Pass Summit to near Trinity Junction, moving north northeast. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. In addition to the dust, localized areas with heavy rainfall is further reducing visibility. SOURCE...Doppler radar and ground observations. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. Visibility may be reduced below a mile due to dust and heavy rain along Interstate 80 from approximately Trinity Junction to Imlay. Locations impacted include... Lovelock, Trinity Junction, Oreana, Imlay, Unionville, Junction I 80 And Nv 396/857 (exit 112), Seven Troughs Mountain, Rye Patch Reservoir, Junction I 80 And U.S 95 (exit 83), Star Peak, Mount Tobin, Trinity Peak, Majuba Mountain, Mill City, Lovelock Derby Field Airport, McKinney Pass, Rye Patch Reservoir Campground, Toulon Peak, Organ Peak and Buffalo Mountain. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be hazardous. Delay or reroute travel. Remain aware of the weather.
